name: Sling Pilot Academy
about: Sling Pilot Academy, located at Zamperini Field in Torrance, California, is a comprehensive flight training school dedicated to transforming aspiring pilots into commercial aviation professionals. With a holistic approach, the academy offers an accelerated 9-month Professional Pilot Course, utilizing the industry-renowned King Schools curriculum and state-of-the-art Sling NGT training aircraft. Students can achieve seven ratings, including Private Pilot, Instrument Rating, and Commercial Multi-Engine, and are employed as instructors upon completion. The academy is known for its modern glass cockpit trainers, extensive maintenance facilities, and a unique "Under My Wing" mentor program. Sling Pilot Academy is committed to providing a cost-effective, full-time program that prepares students for a career as an airline pilot, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a rapid and thorough aviation education.
